content: And for the next year we believe there is not too much new polysilicon come out as we see that, even though just like I said, some new player come in because of the design time, because of construction time, because of the technology, because of the increments, I think the made, design made and also installation, all these factors add together. So even though considering the polysilicon come out, the price I think jumped back last year, letâs say second half of last year, some new comer come in. We think you know the polysilicon price is possible linked to module price and we think â I think in one year or more, I donât think the price will do down.
